articles.title: Extreme weather expected as El Nino climate pattern returns, US forecaster says - Reuters
articles.description: El Nino has officially returned and is likely to yield extreme weather later this year, from tropical cyclones spinning toward vulnerable Pacific islands to heavy rainfall in South America to drought in Australia and in some parts of Asia.
